prs.title: doc: correct tools README Boxstarter link
doc: clarify difference between Node.js fetch and browser fetch
tools: bump the eslint group in /tools/eslint with 6 updates
tools: lint new WPTRunner() paths for no duplicates
test: fix race condition in watch mode tests
esm: add import trace for evaluation errors
test: update WPT for url to e3c46fdf55
src: optimize utf-8 byte length calculation using simdutf
module: fix extensionless entry with explicit type=commonjs
errors: fix incorrect argument label for array elements
test_runner: exclude ignored lines from BRDA in lcov output
http: align header value validation with Fetch spec
url: update ada to v3.4.2 and support unicode 17
doc: add arm64-musl info into platform list
doc: update IBM/Red Hat volunteers with dedicated project time
assert: fix loose deepEqual arrays with undefined and null failing
sea: print error information when fs operations fail
sqlite: avoid extra copy for large text binds
test_runner: fix test enqueue when test file has syntax error
test: split test-embedding.js and run tests in parallel

issues.title: Provide methods for checking if an object is `FileHandle` (`node:fs`)
tls.getCACertificates('system') throws "X509 to PEM conversion" error on Windows
Infinite loop in REPL when creating promise that rejects
test_runner: node:coverage ignore comments exclude DA but leave BRDA in lcov output
assert.deepEqual([null], [undefined]) behavior changed in v22.16.0 (undocumented breaking change)
HTTP module does not allow sending all valid header values
`--build-sea` NodeJS 25.5.0: `Error: Couldn't stat executable node` Windows, Command Prompt
test_runner: expectFailure should support a reason (like todo/skip) and a specific expected failure
For test file with syntax error, no "file" field for `test:enqueue` event with `isolation: "none"`
--use-system-ca does not work with macOS Keychain
[util] Allow `styleText` to take in hex colors
See 'Error: Cannot find module 'typescript'' when building next.js project
fetch() ETIMEDOUT on specific Cloudflare IPs while curl.exe works on Windows
`readline` Regression since v24.2.0 `Cannot read properties of undefined (reading 'pause')`
Error [ERR_INTERNAL_ASSERTION]: This is caused by either a bug in Node.js or incorrect usage of Node.js internals.
fs.globSync can't traverse on allowed directory by specific `--allow-fs-read`
Add an option not to trap SIGINT (Ctrl + C) to `readline.creatInterface`
v8 assert from CheckGlobalAndEternalHandles while building a snapshot on android
API docs version header uses v version prefix
fetch() doesn't cancel ReadableStream request body when connection closes (ECONNRESET)
doc: missing highest compatible Microsoft Visual Studio version
MongoDB SRV connection fails in Node v24.13.0 (works in v24.11.1)  Version:
Ninja build does not work with --shared on Linux
Various flaky tests when running on test-osuosl-aix72-ppc64_be-3

commits.message: test_runner: fix test enqueue when test file has syntax error
sea: print error information when fs operations fail
src: add initial support for ESM in embedder API
net: add `setTOS` and `getTOS` to `Socket`
doc: align Buffer.concat documentation with behavior
benchmark: add streaming TextDecoder benchmark
lib: use utf8 fast path for streaming TextDecoder
doc: fix node-config-schema
url: update ada to v3.4.2 and support unicode 17
doc: update IBM/Red Hat volunteers with dedicated project time
assert: fix loose deepEqual arrays with undefined and null failing
sqlite: change approach to fix segfault SQLTagStore
src: improve textEncoder encode performance with simdutf
test_runner: update node-config-schema
src: expose help texts into node-config-schema.json
test: split test-fs-watch-ignore-*
lib: recycle queues
test_runner: fix passing `expectFailure`
build: aix: deoptimize implementation-visitor.cc with --shared
deps: update undici to 7.19.2
test: aix: unflake test_threadsafe_function/test flaky on AIX
test_runner: differentiate todo and failure styles
lib: use StringPrototypeStartsWith from primordials in locks
doc: regenerate `node.1` using `doc-kit`
deps: update archs files for openssl-3.5.5
deps: upgrade openssl sources to openssl-3.5.5
stream: add bytes() method to stream/consumers
test_runner: add env option to run function
sqlite: reserve vectors space
build: add `--shared-lief` configure flag
